```{r}
# exclude electro data from this df
nets_df_final <- df_final |>
  filter(!Protocol == "electro") 

# change that presence and abundance are in one column
nets_df_final <- nets_df_final |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c("Abundance", "Presence"), 
    names_to = "Parameter", 
    values_to = "value"
  )
```
